c3po.evolution package¶

Submodules¶

c3po.evolution.propagation module¶

c3po.evolution.propagation.dirty_wrap(func)¶
c3po.evolution.propagation.propagate(model, gate, u0, tlist, method, tf_sess=None, grad=False, history=False)¶

Wrapper function for choosing the type of propagation method. :param model: :class:’c3po.model’

Meta class for system hamiltonian

Parameters

  • u0 – can be a state, a unitary or …

  • tlist –

    …

  • method – switch for choosing the desired propagator. options are: “pwc”, “pwc_tf”, “qutip_sesolv”

c3po.evolution.propagation.sesolve_pwc(H, u0, tlist, args={}, grad=False, history=False)¶

Find the propagator of a system Hamiltonian H(t). The initial basis u0. The hamiltonian :param H: :class:’qutip.qobj’

System hamiltonian or a list of Drift and Control terms

Parameters

  • u0 – can be a state, a unitary or a rectangular matrix made of several initial states.

  • tlist – time vector

Output

list of unitaries (Qobj) for all times in tlist or just the initial and final time (depending on history setting)

c3po.evolution.propagation.sesolve_pwc_tf(H, params, tlist, session, grad=False, history=False)¶

Find the propagator of a system Hamiltonian H(t). The initial basis u0. The hamiltonian :param H: given in tensorflow

System hamiltonian or a list of Drift and Control terms
